plugin.name: Prettify
general.form.errors.url: Field should be a valid url.
general.form.errors.duplicate: Field may not be the same as ''{field}''.

detail.form.from.label: Pretty Link
detail.form.to.label: Target URL
detail.form.type.label: Type
detail.form.submit.title: Save
detail.form.submit.new.title: Save and new
detail.form.type.value.moved_permanently: 301: A permanent redirect. The browser will cache this redirect, so upon removing many users will still be redirected.
detail.form.type.value.found_302.descrip: 302: Temporary redirect. This redirect will NOT be cached by the browser, when removed the old link will be available again.
detail.form.type.value.temporary_redirec: 307: Temporary redirect with the same HTTP method. The From and To links must have the same HTTP method. This redirect will NOT be cached by the browser, when removed the old link will be available again.
detail.form.type.value.gone_410.descript: 410: Gone. The page is gone and will never return. This link is used when content is unavailable.
detail.form.type.value.unavailable_for_l: 451: Unavailable For Legal Reasons. This page is unavailable due to legal reasons.
Duplicate link. Redirect with the same 'Linkr Link' field already exists.
detail.form.save.notify.error.LOOP.messa: Link will cause a loop. The given 'Target' field will eventually loop back to the 'From' field.
